remarks: The value of the identity element of a group.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Aug-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
grpidval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpidval.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpidval.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
grpidval $p |- .0. = ( iota e ( e e. B /\ A. x e. B ( ( e .+ x ) = x /\ ( x .+ e ) = x ) ) ) $.
$d B e x $.
$d G e x $.
